message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good deal, but you'll have to take less.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think it's still a good deal!
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I think it's fair this time.
I'll give you a small share, but I think it's the best I can do!
I'm not leaving with nothing, I'll take what's left.
I'll give you the whole thing, but only if you agree to give me nothing!
You're not getting the whole thing, I'm taking almost all!
I'll give you the whole thing, but only if you agree to give me nothing, and we can finally end this!
